attributes.action: Please help us to save Warwickshire's retained Fire Stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Warwickshire County Council plan to release details on Monday (14th September 2009) of how plan to close 6 of our retained Fire Stations in Warwickshire! 

This is going to have potentially life threatening consequences for all those in Warwickshire. 
It's going to mean 8 less fire engines and 110 less fire fighters.
For a service that is already overstreched, if these closures go ahead it's hard to say how much longer it will take firefighters to reach you if one day you're in a car accident or a fire.
We have to fight to keep the level of safety we've always had!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to please help us to save Warwickshire's retained Fire Stations.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=SaveWFRS


Her Majesty's Government
